testcase.classname: User should be able to reserve a car
testcase.name: User should be able to reserve a car as customer service profile
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed And user login dropdown.....................................................passed And user sends username "customer@bluerentalcars.com".......................passed And user sends password "12345".............................................passed When user clicks on login button............................................passed And user selects a "Honda Civic"............................................passed And user enters pick up place "Mersin"......................................passed And user enters drop off place "Anamur".....................................passed And user enters pick up date "01/10/2094"...................................passed And user enters pick up time "01:00PM"......................................passed And user enters drop off date "02/10/2094"..................................passed And user enters drop off time "08:00AM".....................................passed Then user clicks on continue reservation....................................passed Then verify complete reservation screen pop up..............................passed And user enters card number "1234123412341234"..............................passed And user enters "Ali Can" on the card.......................................passed And user enters "1225" and reservation........................................passed Then verify Reservation created successfully pop up.........................passed And naviaged to Reservations secreen........................................passed And verify the last reservation is created "Honda Civic" "Mersin" "Anamur"..passed When you click on the last
